Package Coordinator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CentralProcessor
    The CentralProcessor coordinates the work of several solvers.
    PreProcessor
    The preprocessor reads analyses the basic clauses and transfers them to the Clause-datastructure.
    Processor
    This is the superclass for PreProcessor, CentralProcessor and all Solver classes.
    Task
    The purpose of this class and its subclasses is to fill a Priority Chain with prioritizes tasks to be executed.
    Task.BinaryClause
    It contains a newly derived two-literal clause
    Task.Equivalence
    It contains a newly derived equivalence class
    Task.LiteralRemoval
    It removes a literal from a clause This task can be generated by an external processor which has different data structures
    Task.Purity
    It removes pure clauses
    Task.Satisfiability
    It contains a Satisfiable object.
    Task.ShortenedClause
    It contains a newly shortened clause with at least 3 literals.
    Task.TrueLiteral
    It contains a newly derived unit literal.
    Task.Unsatisfiability
    It contains an Unsatisfiable object.
